translated: Albert Camus (born in 1913 in Mondovi, Algeria - died in 1960 in Villeblin, France) is a French writer and journalist of the twentieth century.
original: Albert Camus (né en 1913 à Mondovi, en Algérie – mort en 1960 à Villeblin, en France) est un écrivain et journaliste français du XXe siècle.
